          <title>
            <string language="sl">Utrjevanje znanja</string>
            <string language="en">Drilling knowledge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bohrenwissen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La connaissance de forage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conhecimento perfurando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conoscenza perforante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνώση διάτρυσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conocimiento que perfora</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec razume in zna uporabiti pridobljeno znanje pri oblikovanju dokumenta. Učenec zna shranit v mapo dokument, odpirati, brisati in preimnovati Dokument, uporabiti velikosti, vrste in oblike pisav, uporabljati sloge Uporabljati odložišče , nastavitve strani, poravnavo besedila in številčenje strani. Vstaviti sliko v dokument, zna spreminjati lego in velikost slike v dokumentu.</string>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan on how to organize drilling exercises to  repeat what has already be told.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">microsoft word</string>
            <string language="en">microsoft word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">urejevalnik besedila</string>
            <string language="en">word processor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naloga</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan auf, wie man bohrenübungen zur 
Wiederholung organisiert, was bereits hat erklärt zu werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon sur la façon dont organiser des 
exercices de forage à la répétition ce qui a déjà pour être dit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição em como organizar exercícios 
perfurando ao repeat o que tem já ser dito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione su come organizzare le 
esercitazioni perforanti a ripetizione che cosa ha già dirsi a.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο μαθήματος για το πώς να οργανώσει τη 
διάτρυση ασκεί για να επαναλάβει τι πρέπει να ειπωθεί ήδη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección en cómo ordenar ejercicios 
que perforan a la repetición qué tiene ya ser dicha.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Microsoft Word</string>
          </keyword>
